titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Coastal Heritage Trail Route in the State of New Jersey, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14019)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-556.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 290.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote. (consideration: CR 11/19/93 S16573)

action.text: Received in the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
By Senator Johnston from Committee on Energy and Natural Resources filed written report under the authority of the order of Nov 17, 93. Report No. 103-212.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.
Executive Comment Requested from Interior.

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-443.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 245.

action.text: Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Message on House action received in Senate and at desk: House amendment to Senate bill.
Senate agreed to the House amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 3/21/1994--Passed House amended. Authorizes appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for the Coastal Heritage Trail Route in New Jersey in addition to any sums appropriated for the Trail for use during fiscal years ending on or before September 30, 1993. Requires such funds to be used solely for technical assistance and the design and fabrication of interpretive materials, devices, and signs. Prohibits the funds from being used for operation, maintenance, repair, or construction except for construction of interpretive exhibits. Limits the Federal share of the total cost of any project carried out with such funds to 50 percent on a matching basis.
